com.vungle.sdk

Class VungleAdvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • com.vungle.publisher.FullScreenAdActivity
                • com.vungle.sdk.VungleAdvert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    Deprecated. 

    Please use VunglePub and FullScreenAdActivity.

    If you are using this class, please ensure that you are using it with the associated classes in this package (you may not mix and match with the new classes in the com.vungle.publisher package):

    • VunglePub

    public class VungleAdvert
extends FullScreenAdActivity
    This is the full screen video ad activity.
    See Also:
    VunglePub
